column5: Are there any places to fish for pike near the sault ?
Around St Joes island. I'm going in 2 weeks to play with the 30 to 40 inchers  Other than that...tons of places. You gotta be more specific in how you want to attack em
lots of hammer handles in echo bay.
from shore or in a canoe sorry should of said that
Echo bay or down around Pine Island area with the canoe.

......the only thing i ever caught around echo bay is smallies, my uncle caught a 12" pike from under the bridge and a catfish. but anywho, all around the soo is good for pike, best pike waters i've ever been in though is wakomata lake <(some real nice biggins in there) and some of the lakes between wawa and whiteriver. and ya st joe's island too, even though last time i went the weather was crap and they werent really feeding.(i was fishing around the bridge). the walleye night bite is decent too in the current around the bridge.
